metadata.title: CVE-2020-14385 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the Linux kernel before 5.9-rc4. A failure of the filesystem metadata validator in XFS can cause an inode with a valid,user-creatable extended attribute to be flagged as corrupt. This can leadto the filesystem being shutdown, or otherwise rendered inaccessible untilit is remounted, leading to a denial of service. The highest threat fromthis vulnerability is to system availability.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
